snippet: Israel arrested a Palestinian man last month accused of being the prime mover in the kidnapping and murder of three Israeli teenagers in June, it emerged from court papers.
abstract: Court papers reveal that Israeli authorities have arrested Palestinian man Hussam Qawasmeh, accusing him of being prime mover in kidnapping and murder of three Israeli teenagers, setting off most recent conflict with Hamas in Gaza.
lead_paragraph: Israel arrested a Palestinian man last month accused of being the prime mover in the kidnapping and murder of three Israeli teenagers in June, it emerged from court papers.

headline.main: Arrest by Israel in Abduction of 3 Youths Is Made Public
headline.print_headline: Israeli Arrest Made Public in Abduction of 3 Youths
